name: Salt Robot (Circular Pong)
description:
This is an entry for Games Factory Jam 8.

We have to make a game less than 60 hours with an island theme.

One of three themes the participants have picked is pong, so I took this opportunity to make a circular pong game.

I used some sound effects from SoundBible and a music from Free Music Archive. And the one in the About page is done by myself with Bosca Ceoil.
